repairedDockerfile:
FROM alpine:3.5
MAINTAINER Niklas Rust <rust@qabel.de>

RUN apk add \ 
	--no-cache \
	 uwsgi \
	py-pip \
	alpine-sdk \
	bash \
	postgresql-dev \
	uwsgi-python3 && \
	 apk add \
	--no-cache \ 
	--repository http://nl.alpinelinux.org/alpine/3.4/main \
	python3-dev && \
		pip3 install --no-cache-dir \
	virtualenv \
	requests

ADD . /app
WORKDIR /app
RUN sh Docker/bootstrap.sh
ENTRYPOINT ["bash", "entrypoint.sh"]
EXPOSE 4233
